dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset of 3D models used for evaluating novel view synthesis methods, particularly in the context of neural radiance fields.

dcterms:description: A dataset containing high-speed and high dynamic range video recordings from a DAVIS 346C colour event camera, used for evaluating event-based video processing methods.

dcterms:description: Event sequences recorded for real data experiments, used to evaluate the proposed method in real-world scenarios.
